[requires]
assimp/5.0.1
libpng/1.6.37
freeglut/3.2.1
glew/2.2.0
zlib/1.2.11

[generators]
gcc
cmake
txt

[options]
poco:shared=True
openssl:shared=True

[imports]
#bin, *.* -> ./Bin # Copies all dll files from the package "bin" folder to my project "bin" folder
#lib, *.* -> ./Lib # 
#include, *.* -> ./Include #
